name: Dress me up for girls - Create your favorite looks
name_original: Dress me up for girls - Create your favorite looks
description:
Go inside our Fashion Boutique and choose the hairstyle, dresses and accessories you like the most to dress up these 4 girls.

Dress me up for girls is a simple and fun game for children of all ages, who want to be stylists or like the fashion world.

This fashion game offers 4 different girl models that you can dress up and choose the hairstyle you like. Change clothing and accessories and get thousands of combinations for different looks.

HAIRSTYLES AND HAIRCUTS

Become a stylist and choose the hairstyle you like for each model:
Braids
Pigtails
Long hair
Short hair
Medium-long hair

CLOTHING AND ACCESSORIES

Combine the hair color and hairstyle with your favorite clothing and accessories!

Tops & T-shirts
Long and short pants, jeans, sweatpants
Party and casual dresses
High heels, boots and slippers
Long and short skirts
Handbags
Earrings and necklaces
Sunglasses
Scarves

Take out clothes and accessories from the closet and combine them to create different styles and trendy looks.

Once you have finished the look, you can take a picture and save it on your phone.

Stefany, Daniela, Elisa and Gisela are waiting on the dressing room so that you help them to find the perfect look. Play and show off your personal shopper skills!
